pages.title: Occult Cauldron
pages.text: Occult Cauldrons allow for offering a sacrifice in blood to the Great Void Beyond through the $(l:stylish_occult:general/dark_altar)Dark Altar$(), they must be placed no further than 6 blocks from the central pylon.$(p)An occult cauldon can be created by clicking on a normal cauldron with a $(l:stylish_occult:general/staff)Staff$().

Those cauldrons can also be picked up without loosing the contents inside. $(p)When active during a ritual blood in a cauldron will boil. You can also force it to do it all the time by placing a heat source such as lava, fire, or a lit campfire under it.
